name: Cash Printer
description:
Live out your   cash-fueled dreams, and visualize your future  in a world of nothing but cash and a printer that makes cash.

Bring your fantasize   & desires to life. 

Standing on a literal mountain of money, while it rains upon you is    a printer that prints cash.

Live the reality of having enough money for everything you need and more with a never ending stream of money printed at your face.

Is this a meditation app, a goal visualizer,  a 2020 government stimulous simulator or a dystopian vision of a capitalistic future? Is there a difference? That is up to you.

Great to show friends, and give someone a "WTF, really?!" Experience.
